text: Scary chart from @nytimes  showing #covid19 in UK  and South Africa vs neighbours puts the latest  #lockdown into perspective. Too fast a rise for #vaccine to save us from lockdown again. @NHSuk @ABPI_UK @HSJEditor @IPPR @andrewgregory @profchrisham @ProfDonnaHall @hannahjfarrar https://t.co/LRna0ODftP
